sentence: — Rep. Jim Jordan (@Jim_Jordan) March 17, 2022 Last week, the TSA announced the decision to extend the mask mandate — which was set to expire Friday, March 18 — another month.
author: Hannah Bleau
title: Jim Jordan: ‘End’ the TSA Mask Mandate

sentence: Everybody’s concerned about that story,” said Rep. Jim Jordan, R-Ohio, a Trump loyalist who is likely to chair the Judiciary Committee if Republicans win the House back in November.
title: Republicans squirm as Trump presses Putin for dirt on Bidens

sentence: Also in 2018, Rep. Jim Jordan, one of Trump’s fiercest allies and a co-founder of the hardline conservative Freedom Caucus, became embroiled in a scandal over his time as a wrestling coach at Ohio State University, where a team doctor named Richard Strauss, who committed suicide in 2005, was found to have sexually abused more than 177 male student athletes.
author: Jordan Weissmann
title: So, Let’s Talk About Republicans and Sex Crimes
